settings.heading: We believe that we are the most sustainable uniform provider in the world.

settings.text: At Kapes, we're rethinking school uniforms. With an unwavering commitment to sustainability, durability, and ethics, we're raising the bar for the industry setting this new standard, creating high-quality, comfortable uniforms with a conscience.

At Kapes, sustainability is not just a buzzword. We understand the critical role we play in shaping a more sustainable future, and we don't take it lightly. Our uniforms, sports kits, and accessories are made from 100% sustainable materials, we only work with ethically certified factories, we measure and offset our impact, and we give back to society.

We're firm believers that a school uniform should endure the demands of a school year and beyond. Investing in superior quality from the start can save parents both time and money in the long run. We're so confident about the durability of our products, that we provide a year-long guarantee on them.

Our size range is broad and inclusive, running from 2-3 years up to 3XL to suit every student! If a student needs a size smaller, larger, or longer than our core range, we're capable of custom-making products to cater to their needs. We also understand kids grow. That's why our uniforms are designed with growth-friendly features. Our shorts, skorts, and trousers all include elasticated waists and easy-adjust buttons.

From the moment you partner with Kapes, a dedicated in-house team will be there to assist you through the onboarding process and throughout your partnership with us. Your Account Manager and Account Support Representative are available year-round to ensure the smooth operation of your uniform program and answer any queries your school community may have.

Our experienced customer service team is at your disposal Monday through Friday throughout the year. If you can't find the answers in our Help Centre page, our customer service team are more than willing to assist you with any queries you may have via phone, email, or live chat.

At your school's convenience, we can set up a "pop-up" shop right on your campus for uniform orders. These events are ideal for introducing new students to your school's uniform and ensuring they order the correct sizes and quantities for school. Our team of uniform experts will be there to help students choose the right products based on their school's requirements and try on items for size. Our pop-ups are great for first-time uniform shoppers and those who prefer to try before they buy.

Kapes offers diverse shopping channels to make your school uniform shopping experience effortless throughout the year, whether it's a parenrts first-time shopping with us or their hundredth!

Our online shop makes it easy to order uniforms at your convenience. Simply enter your schoolâ€™s unique code to browse the uniform products designated by your school. Create an account to review previous orders and sizes. You can have your order shipped to your home or your local store.

Discovering the perfect fit should never be a hurdle. At Kapes, we've bridged the gap between the online shopping & the in-person experience with our Fitting Room service at your school. This dedicated room is stocked with every product in every size from our range, making it available for students to try on throughout the year.

The Fitting Room empowers parents and students to understand exactly what sizes work best before placing an order online. It's an assurance of comfort & confidence in each Kapes uniform item.

Our Fitting Room streamlines the online shopping process, ensuring each Kapes uniform is a perfect fit from the very first wear. Welcome to a hassle-free, perfectly tailored school uniform shopping experience with Kapes.

We understand the challenges parents face when it comes to buying school uniforms. To make things a little easier, we've introduced our In-School Collection service, a convenient option that merges online shopping with physical pick-up. Parents can place their order through our website and collect their purchase from a dedicated e-commerce locker located within the school premises.

This not only saves parents valuable time but also reduces the carbon footprint associated with home deliveries. It's a win-win for convenience and sustainability, all in one neat package
